Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product holds immense value to us, but we understand its worth to you is equally significant. We're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9500. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored to recognize your interest and commitment. Don't miss out on this chance to own a piece that promises to exceed your expectations. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
